work.title: Programmer Analyst
work.description: During the last nine months of my stint in the Walmart ISD IT Rotational Program I worked in the fulfillment pillar as a JavaScript developer/Front-end developer. In December, this position formally transferred to a Programmer Analyst role. In this role, I have worked as a UI Lead/Design Lead utilizing various MVC JavaScript frameworks to deliver scalable, efficient fulfillment applications that can service Walmart's uniquely diverse portfolio of brands around the globe. A few of the technologies I've worked with include HTML5/CSS3, JavaScript's Backbone and Angular frameworks, the Adobe Creative Suite and Balsalmiq for design mockups.

work.title: IT Rotational Analyst
work.description: The IT Rotational Program at Walmart is an 18 month long crash-course in all things Walmart ISD. For the first 9 months, I spent time in Security, Field Support, and Quality Assurance before settling in the in-store fulfillment team in the Application Development environment. Each pillar rotation provides invaluable insight into the inner workings of a large information systems division and helps to develop a broader perspective on the retail industry as a whole.

work.title: Web Platform Programmer
work.description: My responsibilities at TCoA primarily consisted of developing state and federal tax forms and the database tables that they would utilize. I spent most of my development work utilizing PHP, MySQL, and HTML. Forms I built for TCoA included the 1040-ES, the RRB-1099, and tax forms for the states of South Carolina and Maine.

work.title: Agency Intern
work.description: My responsibilities at State Farm included scheduling policy reviews, contacting policyholders about changes to their policies, limited work with social media marketing, and managing the IT in the office.

skills.name: JavaScript
skills.explanation: Three years of progressively advanced JavaScript development in multiple frameworks for an array of personal and professional projects and applications.

skills.name: CSS3
skills.explanation: Three years of progressively advanced CSS/CSS3 for multiple professional and personal projects.

education.degree: Bachelor's of Science in Computer Information Systems
